module.name: Google Voice/Chan Motif
module.description: Manage Google Voice Trunks with Chan Motif
module.changelog: *2.11.14* Database Abstraction Fixes *2.11.13* Stealth Greeting for IVRs *2.11.12* Removed Buddy Listing as it was causing an issue *2.11.11* Fixes to includes *2.11.10* Additions and fixes by drmessano *2.11.9* Added ability to change priority and made the default 127. Also added some more uninstall functionalities *2.11.8* Fixes #6435 increase password length and username length in db *2.11.7* Remove rtp.conf if motif created it, fixes #6397, #6398 *2.11.6* Removes rtp controlled settings, re #6397 *2.11.5* Fixes #6355 *2.11.4* Fixes #6328 outbound routes *2.11.1* Remove beta status. Fixes #6326, #6318 *2.11.0beta2* Redefined routes. Added route to google voicemail option. Fixes #6065, #6066, #6067 *2.11.0beta1* Fixed Multiple Inbound Accounts DID Issue
